text:
Hi, @AraHaan!
I've checked [hiredis diff](https://github.com/redis/hiredis-py/compare/v0.2.0...HEAD) and its only few
minor changes so we can consider pypi version as "fresh").
Also I don't like running tests against unkown dependency version as it is possible that
two parallel build could run against different hiredis commits and it would be hard to replay such builds.

Update appveyor hiredis install.

Update building on appveyor to install latest hiredis.
